attributes.action: MPs also get a pay freeze when the public sector workers so.
attributes.additional_details: It is in the interests of fairness and true leadership to share the burden of pay freezes along with the public sector of whom MPs are a part.
attributes.background: To legislate that if the Treasury announce a public sector pay freeze then IPSA cannot grant any pay rises until the public sector pay freeze is removed.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554400

The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
